entry.title: in losing grip on sinking ships (you showed up just in time)
entry.summary:
Author: justiceiscalling

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,882Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 45

Summary: You were trained for this. You scream at yourself in your head, shed the cape, angle your body. But you canâ€™t even get past the first step. Your broken arm is deadweight, dragging you further down.Water floods your nose, your throat. You gag, but the coughing only drags more inside. Every instinct screams at you to breathe, but thereâ€™s no airâ€”only black, filthy water forcing its way down, burning.Donâ€™t breathe. You think to yourself. Donâ€™t waste air. Bruce had trained that into you when you had first donned the suit, had told you to read every protocol in a large book (nearly a thousand pages worth) until you knew all of them like the back of your hand. Burning, building collapsing, drowning. The issue wasnâ€™t that you forgot it. No, you knew exactly what you had to do.The issue was that you couldnâ€™t.Â ORAfter breaking Bruces wishes and a promise you had made to Damian, you find yourself drowning in the Gotham River.Â Title from This Love by Taylor Swift, rated teen and up for canon-typical violence, swearing, and descriptions of things such as drowning. Reading Saving Grace is not needed to understand this work, but it is highly recommended for no confusion.

entry.title: Sharp tongue , soft heart
entry.summary:
Author: softbambi

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,052Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: She was raised in the laboratories of Lex Luthor, the product of an experiment that sought to merge the human mind with unstable arcane power. Her life had been nothing but chains, trials, and painâ€¦ until Zatanna, sensing the magical distortion within her, rescued her. Knowing she couldnâ€™t leave the girl alone, she took her to the only place where protection was certain: Wayne Manor.Bruce, with that mixture of coldness and responsibility, chose to adopt her. Not out of pity, but because he recognized something familiar in her eyes: the weight of having been created for someone elseâ€™s purpose.But Damian did not accept her so easily. To him, she was neither sister nor ally, but a laboratory mistake. He distrusted her, watching every move, provoking her during training.She, tired of being treated like a monster, fought back with equal fire. Wayne Manor echoed with verbal duels and clashes of characterâ€”like fire meeting gunpowder.

entry.title: Under Protection
entry.summary:
Author: Nightly_Darkk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 715Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 14

Summary: The mission sounded simple at first: protect Gotham's most infamous vigilantes in their civilian skins. The reality? Nothing is simple in Wayne Manor. The secrets there cling like shadows to the wall and for all of Batman's insistence of strategy, it's starting to feel a lot more like scheming. The BatBoys are restless, sharp, always watching. Constantly bristling at the idea of being protected.And in the middle of it all is her. A girl so unaware of the storm coming closer to her door each day. She isn't supposed to be there. She isn't even supposed to matter. But she does- and no one can say why. The was told to protect them. Nobody said what they'd have to protect themselves from.

Author: YourLocalGothamite

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 95,123Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 329
